news.title: Man who dumped remains in suitcases guilty of murder
news.summary: Yostin Mosquera, 35, "decapitated and dismembered" two men before trying to dispose of their bodies.

news.title: At least 19 dead after air force jet crashes into Bangladesh school
news.summary: The air force says the F-7 jet experienced a mechanical fault after taking off for a training exercise in Dhaka.

news.title: New regulator and higher bills - key takeaways from water industry report
news.summary: The wide-ranging review was launched amid growing public concern about sewage spills and rising bills.

news.title: Weak password allowed hackers to sink a 158-year-old company
news.summary: Transport company KNP forced to shut down after international hacker gangs target thousands of UK businesses.

news.title: Divers find WW1 ship 109 years after it was sunk
news.summary: HMS Nottingham's location had remained a mystery until its discovery this month.

news.title: Mum and daughter found dead months after 999 plea
news.summary: Alphonsine Djiako Leuga and her daughter were found three months after the call, an inquest hears.

news.title: Plans to expand Wimbledon tennis site can go ahead, judge rules
news.summary: A High Court judge dismisses a legal challenge against the decision to approve the club's expansion.

news.title: Ulrika Jonsson hits back at people 'offended by ageing face'
news.summary: The TV presenter responds to criticism about her appearance in a recent podcast interview.

news.title: Boy, 10, killed in coach crash named
news.summary: The child died after a coach carrying up to 70 people crashed.

news.title: Tribunal nurse 'would not treat trans patients differently'
news.summary: Sandie Peggie was suspended following an altercation with Dr Beth Upton - a trans woman - on Christmas Eve 2023.
